title: Season VII Trailer
description:
Spooked Season VII is risen. Host Glynn Washington is diving deep into unknown corners of the world—creatures hidden in the dark crag of the Appalachian, secrets stowed in the murky depths of the Caribbean, forbidden magic from Mexico, and so much more. Listen if you dare. Just don’t say we didn’t warn you.

Leave the lights on. Trust us. Spooked Season 7 is coming with 26 brand NEW episodes September 9th!!! And things are about to get dark.

To listen to all episodes of Spooked as they’re released regularly through next Spring, subscribe to the Luminary Channel on Apple Podcasts, or directly on Luminary, https://luminary.link/spooked
